spells.description: Equip: Embrace the darkness. Double the effects of your other Nerubian embellished item, positive and negative.

effects.display_string: (2) Set: Your spells and abilities have a chance to hit a Jackpot! that summons a Storm Elemental for 7.2 sec. Casting Ascendance always hits a Jackpot!
(4) Set: When you summon or extend your Storm Elemental, your Lightning Bolt, Chain Lightning, Tempest, and Lava Burst deal 30% increased damage for 8 sec.

name: Cyrce's Circlet
description: Sea dogs and tale spinners tell stories of a mythical siren that could lure even the stubbornest sailors to a watery grave.

spells.description: Equip: Your abilities have a chance to stir the sac, releasing an egg which grants you 1,401 Intellect. Each egg hatches after 1 min, and the new brood attacks your next target, inflicting 112,229 Nature damage over 8 sec.
Use: Summon a Bursting Lightspawn which sacrifices its health to unleash Bursts of Light, inflicting 454,729 Holy damage split between nearby enemies every 2 sec while it lives. (2 Min Cooldown)

Equip: Gain Ascendance every 8 seconds spent in combat.

Ascendance grants 89 of a random secondary stat for 15 sec, stacking up to 10 times.

This is a Nerubian embellishment.
